comment: I took her, did all of the work, but a lot of her work requires questions which is fine but she never responds. She was unresponsive 90% of the semester and didnt grade anything until the last week of class. Its doable but its not worth the stress of not knowing your grade until very last minute. Does not round up
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Group projects--So many papers

comment: Honestly do not know why her ratings are not all 5.0. She's really caring and wants you to do good. Practically sat there all semester and no tests unless you miss more than three classes. This class is great if you need a quick GPA booster. Really caring and easy A!! Deff recommend.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Caring

comment: I am a low B average student and this was my favorite class and teacher of all time. Professor Wilson is so caring and gives a lot of extra credit throughout the semester. If you miss more than 3 classes you have to take the final but you will seriously want to go to class. Such an amazing class and teacher. TAKE HER IF YOU HAVE THE CHANCE!!!

Never bought a book. We had 18 quizlets and 10 Learn Smart assignments. If you missed more than 3 classes you have to take final. We had a semester long project with business professional presentation. Oh you really don't learn anything! Easiest and pointless class ever.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects

comment: 1. She's a really good person and sweet and works with the class, you just have to voice out your opinion. 2. She's the worst professor ever, as far as being a teacher. She does not teach. I never for once opened my book bag. 3. That is why there are no exams in her class except a final when you skip more than 3 classes 4. And oh! deadlines are BS
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Does not know what she is doing. She is smart but does not know how to stick to her own deadlines. We have had more guest speakers than engaging class periods. She gets mad when you question her, even if it is just to clarify her ever changing directions. No tests and you don't have to take the final if you miss 3 or less classes which is cool.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: I enjoyed her class! The class mainly consist of group projects back to back but it wasn't too bad. Attendance was MANDATORY. miss more than 2 classes than you will have to take the final. She had us get up & present something every class but it helped at the end to get comfortable with presentation skills. Just do the work and you will do well!

Had her during her first semester of teaching, which was obvious. Although there was some struggle keeping up with the schedule on the syllabus, Prof. Wilson altered the syllabus to fit what we were able to accomplish. I'd consider her a very fair prof. and with more experience her classes should become more productive. Make sure you go to class!

Does not know what she's doing. This was her first semester teaching and it shows. Schedule/syllabus changes every day. If you email her, she emails you that she doesn't have time get to your email and that you should talk to her after class. Instructions are unclear. If you miss more than once class, the final is mandatory. Avoid at all costs!
